title: U.S. - average salary for graduates , by discipline 2020
summary: This bar chart has 4 columns on the x axis representing Discipline, and Average salary in U.S. dollars in each Discipline on the y axis.
The maximum Average salary in U.S. dollars 79793.0 is found at Discipline Computer Science and the minimum is found at Business where Discipline is 75197.0.
The difference of Average salary in U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Discipline is 4596.0.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Discipline in the x axis and Average salary in U.S. dollars in the y axis.
The Average salary in U.S. dollars is highest at Discipline Computer Science and lowest at Discipline Business.
The highest Discipline Computer Science has 4596.0 more Average salary in U.S. dollars than the lowest Discipline Business.
Average salary in U.S. dollars at Discipline Computer Science is 79793.0 , second place is Math & Sciences at 79717.0, and thirdly is Engineering at 77298.0.
The Discipline Business tends to be 1.02 percent lower than average.
The Average salary in U.S. dollars is 312005.0 if we add up values of all Disciplines.
